rotate_head_clockwise.description: Rotate the head of the lamp clockwise to adjust the lighting angle.

rotate_head_counterclockwise.description: Rotate the head of the lamp counterclockwise to adjust the lighting angle.

clean_head_with_damp_cloth.description: Clean the lamp head using a damp cloth to remove dust and improve light output.

adjust_head.description: Adjust the head of the lamp to change the direction of the light.

polish_head.description: Polish the head of the lamp to maintain its shine and finish.

rotate_head.description: Rotate the head of the lamp to adjust light positioning.

clean_head.description: Clean the head of the lamp to ensure clear lighting.

clean_base_with_damp_cloth.description: Clean the lamp base with a damp cloth to remove accumulated dust.

press_base_to_stabilize.description: Apply pressure on the base of the lamp to ensure its stability.

dust_off_lamp_base.description: Dust off the lamp base to keep it clean and free of dust particles.

press_lamp_base.description: Press the lamp base to stabilize the lamp.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the lamp_base to remove dust or any other particles.

rotate_and_clean_lamp.description: Adjust the lamp position by rotating the head and then clean all parts to keep it dust-free.

clean_lamp.description: Clean all parts of the lamp to ensure it is dust-free and clean.

adjust_and_clean_lamp.description: Adjust the lamp head for optimal lighting and then clean all parts of the lamp.

clean_whole_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the lamp base and head.
